en.welcome:
Welcome to the inline button message creator bot!
Tap 'Create New Message' to get started.
en.start_text: Please send the main message text:
en.choose_buttons: Select how many buttons you want to add:
en.enter_button_url: Please enter the URL for button #{n}:
en.setup_done: Button setup is complete. What would you like to do next?
en.no_permission: You don't have permission to post to the channel.
en.sent_success: Message successfully sent to the channel!
